resources.string:
1. Description and scope of data processing: 
Upon submitting the following form, the following personal data is collected and stored by the application: 
• Data center/university identification 
• The associated password 
• Completed and passed module courses at the university 
• Grades of the own module courses 

2. Purpose of data processing: 
The temporary storage of the data mentioned under 1. serves the purpose of transmitting them to the university, to register there and evaluate one's own achievements. 

3. Duration of storage: 
The personal data will be irretrievably and immediately deleted as soon as the user uninstalls the application from the device via the method prescribed in the operating system. 

4. Data transfer: 
The data center/university identification and password will be transferred to the servers of the chosen university for querying the respective module information. 

5. Controller and contact person for data protection questions: 
The respective university is responsible for the processing of personal data on the university servers. 
Responsible for the processing of personal data in the university crawler application is: 
Mario Lampert 
Email: hochschulcrawler@gmail.com 

6. Legal basis: 
If the processing of personal data requires the consent of the data subject, Article 6(1)(a) of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) serves as the legal basis. 

7. Your rights: 
You have the right to request confirmation from the controller as to the purpose for which personal data is being processed. 

8. Right to deletion/revocation: 
You can revoke your consent at any time and remove the application from the device via the method prescribed in the operating system. Your data will be completely removed from the device as a result. 

9. Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority: Without prejudice to any other administrative or judicial remedy, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the Member State of your habitual residence, place of work, or the place of the alleged infringement, if you believe that the processing of personal data relating to you violates the GDPR. 
The supervisory authority with which the complaint has been lodged shall inform the complainant of the progress and outcome of the complaint, including the possibility of a judicial remedy under Article 78 of the GDPR. 

This privacy policy is currently valid and dated January 29, 2022.
Now you can close the app.
Every 60 minutes will be checked.\n Estimated data usage per month: 96 MByte
Except at night. Between 1 a.m. and 6 a.m is the QIS not reachable.

QIS Hochschul Crawler runs in background.
Privacy Policy & Consent to Processing of Personal Data.
Depending on your internet connection, the login process can take up to 30 seconds.
Swipe to the right to see your grades.
1. Login \n2. Restart application\n3. See here your grades
Swipe to the left to login or logout.
Login failed! Too many login tries with wrong username/password! Your IP-Address is for a few minutes blocked.
Login failed! username/password wrong or no/unstable connection to the QIS!
Without the following permission, the application cannot run in an optimum way in the background.
Login failed: Between 1 a.m. and 6 a.m is the QIS not reachable!
Service has been temporarily stopped & login data removed. To stop completely uninstall.
We are searching testers from other universities! Contact us at hochschulcrawler@gmail.com
